TopicTitle: Staging - Component Names and Part/Staging-stack visual linking

Articles.Content:
Haven't seen this one suggested after searching through the archives...

I think it might be quite helpful to allow the naming of parts (a tweakable?) so that when mousing over the item in the staging stack we could see the specific user applied name. I know a is part is already highlighted in the VAB/SPH but this is insufficient when working on complex constructions with layers of parts which obstruct the view.

Additionally, it might also be helpful to have a visual indicator line linking the stack icon to the part when moused over.

Hope it helps - if I get a minute I will create a mockup image to indicate my concept. Might be a few days though as I'm moving house.

Cheers,

w
